sections.title: My method
lines: Great design goes beyond the surface. It's not just about interfaces â€” it's about understanding the entire ecosystem a product exists in. That's why I immerse myself in the industries I design for, seeing the bigger picture first before refining the details.

To truly understand music distribution, I explored production hardware and software firsthand. This deep dive gave me insights into how creative tools shape workflows, helping me design one of the most seamless distribution experiences in the industry.
The same approach applies to every product I work on â€” understanding the industry, its workflows, and the people using products is what makes a design truly work.
